title: Postponed: Virtual Talk—Playful Practices
hero_caption: Shiraga Kazuo. Golden Wings Brushing the Clouds Incarnated from Earthly Wide Star (Chikatsusei Maunkinshi), 1960. Through prior purchase from the Mary and Leigh Block Fund, restricted gift of Barbara Bluhm-Kaul and Don Kaul.
short_description: Artist Shiraga Kazuo once described the world as a “splendid playground.” Join educators Alexis Bailey and Allison Muscolino to playfully engage with works of art through movement, conversation, and creative response.
list_description: Join educators Alexis Bailey and Allison Muscolino to playfully engage with works of art through movement, conversation, and creative response.
description:
This event has been postponed. We will notify you if the event is rescheduled.

Artist Shiraga Kazuo once described the world as a “splendid playground.” Join educators Alexis Bailey and Allison Muscolino to playfully engage with works of art through movement, conversation, and creative response.

Explore all upcoming Virtual Talks.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
